Package agent

Class AgentImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • agent.ActiveImp
      • agent.AgentImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileAgentImp
    public abstract class AgentImp
extends ActiveImp
    This class represents the implementation of an Agent in the MAS. It interacts with the Environment for new information of the world by running a separate thread. The agent implementation contains the local view on the world and any received messages. It also has a behaviour.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static final int DEFAULT_BELIEFS
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgentImp

        public AgentImp​(int ID,
                int maxBeliefs)
        Initialize a new instance of AgentImp with id . Every new AgentImp instance is initialized with an empty buffer for incoming messages and an empty buffer for outgoing mails.
        Parameters:
        ID - The id of this AgentImp instance.
        maxBeliefs - : number of maximum beliefs this AgentImp should be able to store

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public final void sendMessage​(AgentRep receiver,
                              java.lang.String message)
        Create a mail from this AgentImp to and with message and add the resulting mail to the buffer of outgoing mails.
        Parameters:
        receiver - The representation of the agent to write the message to
        message - The message to send

        public final void skip()
        Do the skip action (influence)

      • step

        public final void step​(int nx,
                       int ny)
        Creates an influence of the type InfStep and includes it in an ActionOutcome. The Outcome will be sent to the Environment. Influence InfStep: try to step to a target area.
        Parameters:
        nx - the x coordinate of the area to step to
        ny - the y coordinate of the area to step to

      • putPacket

        public final void putPacket​(int tx,
                            int ty)
        Creates an influence of the type InfPutPacket and includes it in an ActionOutcome. The Outcome will be sent to the Environment. Influence InfPutPacket: try to put the carry down on target area.
        Parameters:
        tx - the x coordinate of the target area
        ty - the y coordinate of the target area

      • pickPacket

        public final void pickPacket​(int fx,
                             int fy)
        Creates an influence of the type InfPickPacket and includes it in an ActionOutcome. The Outcome will be sent to the Environment. Influence InfPickPacket: try to pick up a packet from the specified area.
        Parameters:
        fx - the x coordinate of the area of the packet
        fy - the y coordinate of the area of the packet

                               int ty,
                               int lifetime)

        Parameters:
        tx - the x coordinate of the target area
        ty - the y coordinate of the target area
        lifetime - the lifetime for the pheromone

        Parameters:
        tx - the x coordinate of the target area
        ty - the y coordinate of the target area
        lifetime - the lifetime for the pheromone
        target - the area the directed pheromone has to point to

                           int ty,
                           int number)
        Creates an influence of the type InfPutCrumb and includes it in an ActionOutcome. The Outcome will be sent to the Environment. Influence InfPutCrumb: try to put a crumb (or say: a number of crumbs) on target area.
        Parameters:
        tx - the x coordinate of the target area
        ty - the y coordinate of the target area
        number - the number of crumbs to put on target area

        Parameters:
        tx - the x coordinate of the target area
        ty - the y coordinate of the target area

      • seeDestination

        public boolean seeDestination()
        Returns whether this agent sees a destination of the same color of his carry.
        Returns:
        true if this agent has a destination in sight of the color matching to the color of the packet he's carrying, false otherwise.

      • seePacket

        public boolean seePacket()
        Returns whether this agent can see a packet.
        Returns:
        true if this agent has a packet in sight, false otherwise.

        public void catchEvent​(Event e)
        Description copied from interface: Listener
        This method is called for every object registered for the type of p0. Registering has to be done with EventManager.addListener(...)
